extension.summary: Simplified launcher for Amazon Prime Video
extension.description: PrimeHub provides a clean, organized menu for accessing Amazon Prime Video content. This add-on now includes a native backend implementation that directly communicates with Amazon's APIs, removing the dependency on external Amazon VOD add-ons. *Note: This native backend relies on the 'requests' Python library, which must be bundled with the add-on.* Configure and sign in via the add-on's login menu. PrimeHub provides a streamlined entry point and does not bypass DRM.
